org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.nfs.nfs3

Class OpenFileCtx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.nfs.nfs3.OpenFileCtx

  •  class OpenFileCtx
extends Object
    OpenFileCtx saves the context of one HDFS file output stream. Access to it is synchronized by its member lock.

      • addWritesToCache

        private WriteCtx addWritesToCache(org.apache.hadoop.nfs.nfs3.request.WRITE3Request request,
                        org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                        int xid)
        Creates and adds a WriteCtx into the pendingWrites map. This is a synchronized method to handle concurrent writes.
        Returns:
        A non-null WriteCtx instance if the incoming write request's offset >= nextOffset. Otherwise null.

      • processOverWrite

        private void processOverWrite(DFSClient dfsClient,
                    org.apache.hadoop.nfs.nfs3.request.WRITE3Request request,
                    org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                    int xid,
                    org.apache.hadoop.security.IdMappingServiceProvider iug)
        Process an overwrite write request

      • checkAndStartWrite

        private boolean checkAndStartWrite(AsyncDataService asyncDataService,
                         WriteCtx writeCtx)
        Check if we can start the write (back to HDFS) now. If there is no hole for writing, and there is no other threads writing (i.e., asyncStatus is false), start the writing and set asyncStatus to true.
        Returns:
        True if the new write is sequential and we can start writing (including the case that there is already a thread writing).

      • receivedNewWriteInternal

        private void receivedNewWriteInternal(DFSClient dfsClient,
                            org.apache.hadoop.nfs.nfs3.request.WRITE3Request request,
                            org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                            int xid,
                            AsyncDataService asyncDataService,
                            org.apache.hadoop.security.IdMappingServiceProvider iug)

      • processPerfectOverWrite

        private org.apache.hadoop.nfs.nfs3.response.WRITE3Response processPerfectOverWrite(DFSClient dfsClient,
                                                                         long offset,
                                                                         int count,
                                                                         org.apache.hadoop.nfs.nfs3.Nfs3Constant.WriteStableHow stableHow,
                                                                         byte[] data,
                                                                         String path,
                                                                         org.apache.hadoop.nfs.nfs3.response.WccData wccData,
                                                                         org.apache.hadoop.security.IdMappingServiceProvider iug)
        Honor 2 kinds of overwrites: 1). support some application like touch(write the same content back to change mtime), 2) client somehow sends the same write again in a different RPC.

      • checkCommit

        public OpenFileCtx.COMMIT_STATUS checkCommit(DFSClient dfsClient,
                                    long commitOffset,
                                    org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                    int xid,
                                    org.apache.hadoop.nfs.nfs3.Nfs3FileAttributes preOpAttr,
                                    boolean fromRead)
        Check the commit status with the given offset
        Parameters:
        commitOffset - the offset to commit
        channel - the channel to return response
        xid - the xid of the commit request
        preOpAttr - the preOp attribute
        fromRead - whether the commit is triggered from read request
        Returns:
        one commit status: COMMIT_FINISHED, COMMIT_WAIT, COMMIT_INACTIVE_CTX, COMMIT_INACTIVE_WITH_PENDING_WRITE, COMMIT_ERROR

      • streamCleanup

        public boolean streamCleanup(long fileId,
                    long streamTimeout)
        Check stream status to decide if it should be closed
        Returns:
        true, remove stream; false, keep stream

      • offerNextToWrite

        private WriteCtx offerNextToWrite()
        Get (and remove) the next WriteCtx from pendingWrites if possible.
        Returns:
        Null if pendingWrites is null, or the next WriteCtx's offset is larger than nextOffSet.
